name: RUNEGΔRD
description:
Arrange the runestones in the correct formations to complete the teleportation spell and get back home - but beware the vengeful spirits infesting this liminal realm.

WASD - Movement

E - Pick up/drop runes with your levitation field

Mouse - aim, left-click to fire spell. Hover over your avatar to focus and recharge spell energy.

Reload the page to try again.
